client_description_Summary_Note:
Clémence Romane Van den Berghe and the RM met at a financial seminar in Brussels. They attended several workshops together and exchanged ideas on market trends, which sparked a long-term professional relationship.
Clémence Romane Van den Berghe is a 35 year old Analyst from Belgium.
After extensive research, she chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
client_description_Family_Background: Clémence Romane Van den Berghe is married to Simons. They do not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background:
Clémence finished secondary school at Atheneum Antwerpen Linkeroever in 2009.
Clémence completed her university studies at Université catholique de Louvain in 2014.
In 2017, she received extra education and graduated from Vrije Universiteit Brussel with an additional degree.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Clémence Romane Van den Berghe is a 35 year old and comes from Belgium.
Clémence Romane Van den Berghe began her professional journey as a Analyst at Gimv NV in 2013, laying the foundation for future success.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
During her work, she focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 110000 EUR.
She has townhouse located in Hasselt, worth 860000 EUR.

She inherited 100000 EUR from her grandfather, a well-known Investment Banker, in 2018, allowing her to expand her investment portfolio.
client_description_Client_Summary: The RM is very happy to have Clémence as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
